document.full_text: dan uggla started the season as atlanta's no. 5 hitter but has fallen to no. 7, and has been getting regular days off to get him back on track.
document.title: despite his season-long slump, the braves' uggla isn't being written off
lines_and_colors: dan uggla started the season as atlanta's no. 5 hitter but has fallen to no. 7, and has been getting regular days off to get him back on track.
